nodes.text: A  division of the Galactic Empire participated in an attack on Burnin Konn during Operation: Cinder. Migs Mayfeld served within the division, which was under the command of General Valin Hess and consisted of 5,000-10,000 soldiers. The division was completely destroyed during the attack on Burnin Konn, leaving Hess and Mayfeld as some of the survivors.
